fields.name: station_id
fields.description: Required. Identifier of a station.

fields.name: name
fields.description: Required. The name of the station.

fields.name: short_name
fields.description: Required. A short identifier for the station.

fields.name: lat
fields.description: Required. The latitude coordinate of the station.

fields.name: lon
fields.description: Required. The longitude coordinate of the station.

fields.name: capacity
fields.description: Required. The total capacity of the station.

fields.name: region_id
fields.description: Required. The region identifier for the station.

fields.name: rental_methods
fields.description: Required. Available methods for renting bikes.

fields.name: is_virtual_station
fields.description: Optional. Indicates if this is a virtual station with no physical infrastructure.

fields.name: station_area
fields.description: Optional. A GeoJSON MultiPolygon that describes the area of a virtual station.

fields.name: is_valet_station
fields.description: Optional. Indicates if this station is attended by staff who can park vehicles.

fields.name: rental_uris
fields.description: Optional. URIs for deep links to rental apps.

fields.name: num_vehicles_available
fields.description: Required. Number of functional vehicles physically at the station that may be offered for rental.

fields.name: num_vehicles_disabled
fields.description: Optional. Number of disabled vehicles of any type at the station.

fields.name: num_docks_available
fields.description: Optional. Number of functional docks physically at the station that are able to accept vehicles for return.

fields.name: num_docks_disabled
fields.description: Optional. Number of disabled dock points at the station.

fields.name: is_installed
fields.description: Required. Indicates if the station is currently installed on the street.

fields.name: is_renting
fields.description: Required. Indicates if the station is currently renting vehicles.

fields.name: is_returning
fields.description: Required. Indicates if the station is accepting vehicle returns.

fields.name: last_reported
fields.description: Required. The last time this station reported its status to the operator's backend.

fields.name: vehicle_types_available
fields.description: Optional. Array of objects representing the number of each vehicle type available at the station.

fields.name: vehicle_docks_available
fields.description: Optional. Array of objects representing the number of docks available for certain vehicle types.
